name: Step Finance
introduce: Step Finance is the front page of Solana that allow users visualise, analyze, aggregate and execute transactions across Solana in one easy to use Dashboard. Step makes it easy for anyone to monitor their portfolio token balances, AMM LP's, yield farms and other positions to give users a summary of current portfolio. Step also has a number of built in functions including Swaps, LPs, Position/Address Monitoring, Fiat Payments and more.
